title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Rambla Don Diego (Recinto Ferial)
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Rambla Don Diego (Recinto Ferial)
description: Great parking in the center of town. Accessible to large motorhomes. Asphalted and flat. No problem to spend the night. During the day there is a lot of traffic but without disturbing. In the quiet night. Close to shops, restaurants and services. Public toilets very close, on the ground floor of the town hall square. Tuesday is market day, do not park, Monday do not spend the night. During the local festivities it is occupied as a Fairground.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 1 Calle Ermita Padre Manuel
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 1 Calle Ermita Padre Manuel
description: I spent the night in Alhama before going up to Sierra Espuña and I found this place open to the ferias ... it has no services of any kind but I have slept calmly and without discomfort. It is very close to the center of town and you can see its castle which I think you can walk up.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 121A Avenida Gines Campos
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 121A Avenida Gines Campos
description: Large car park at the entrance coming from Totana, visit the castle. bathrooms of the archaeological museum ... It is close to the Mercadona shopping center, next door, and the Café el Circulo.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 3 Calle México
description: Finally a self-service laundry where it is easy to park, even for big motorhomes. The laundry chain is one of the cheapest and very efficient. Prices on photos.

title: (30840) Murcia - 1 Diseminado Sierra Muela
description: Area to spend, near the viewpoint of the mill.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 71A Avenida de Antonio Fuertes
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - 71A Avenida de Antonio Fuertes
description: For a stopover not far from the highway. large, slightly sloping car park next to the information point and a few flatter car spaces between this car park and what we believe to be a crematorium. near the cemetery. we had a quiet night. background noise (motorway? air conditioning motors?) not bothersome. in our opinion only for a stage without any unpacking and remaining discreet.

title: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Av. de Antonio Fuertes
title_short: (30840) Alhama de Murcia - Av. de Antonio Fuertes
description: Relatively steep and narrow gravel road, but managable with a regular van. The view is amazing, but it was very dirty when we arrived. Space for 2/3 vans. We cleaned up as much as possible and spent a very quiet night.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: Space for 2 motorhomes on reservoir access road. No services, lots of walks and bike trails quiet and peaceful. Please respect the area.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Carretera Fuente Alta
title_short: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Carretera Fuente Alta
description: Viewpoint of the Sierra Espuña over the Alhama valley of Murcia. Forbidden to stay the night

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent view. Not to difficult to access. Isolated but not far from asfalted road.

title: (30848) Gebas -
description: Beautiful place with nice view of the canyons (Bardenas type) location for 3 vehicles. Access recommended in 4 * 4, height 2m35

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: El Mirador del Embalse de Algeciras. Parking place (3 places) with panoramic view of the water basin. Very calm. Only 2 cars passed during the entire afternoon. Beautiful views.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia -
description: Parking Mirador Barrancos De Gebas (name error on Google map), access by rocky road, OK for all vehicles. Nice view. No off-season services, a water fountain from the point of view, not functional during our visit

title: (30848) - 4 Diseminado Flotas Calceta
description: Private family parking water, electricity, service garage with tools for small and medium reoarations. Hiking advice climbing caving and beaches. Traditional food can be shared in a Spanish family environment. cultural exchange donations and share expenses.very nice family parking, donations are accepted, garage with tools water electricity possible to make fire and share experience with Spanish family traditional food trekking climbing have general information.allowed animals. Possible music cinema ect.pool.sauna ... possible to make fire outside and inside the house.

title: (30848) Los Zancarrones -
description: Pitch in the void overlooking the lake, the landscape is spectacular, a pity that the road to get there is quite bumpy so a 4x4 is recommended.

title: (30848) El Berro -
description: Quiet place, surrounded by forest, near the road and with good access by dirt track.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - 18 Lugar Gebas
description: Parking near Gebas and the Mirador du Barrancos in Gebas, valid for the day and for the night, with a fountain. Many hikes with interesting mountain scenery from this point.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - 232 RM-515
description: Parking next to a restaurant, spectacular place, quiet area for sleeping.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
title_short: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Rest area with public fountain. Gas station. Gray and black cast iron. Water filling in the coin column. Washing for motorhomes. Burger King restaurant. Restaurant cafeteria. Large car park. South orientation.

title: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
title_short: (30848) Alhama de Murcia - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Access to water, but probably no drinking water. Petrol station (Repsol), motorway restaurant and playground

title: (30848) Los Zancarrones - Unnamed Road
description: Unpaved parking lot close to a viewpoint over the lake and great hiking/MB routes around the lake. BEWARE the last kilometer of the road is unpaved and in bad condition, a lot of potholes and loose rocks plus there’s an incline. Ideally for 4x4 but we did it in a van. Not worth it for the park up, as it isn’t very scenic. But if you wanna hike down to the lake, this is a great starting point, go through the gate about 200m and then take the first trail on the right.

name: Camping Sierra Espuña
title: (30848) Camping Sierra Espuña
description: A great small well equipped campsite. lovely walks. great helpful staff. take acsi card.

title: (30892) Librilla - 4 Poligono a Pp Buenavista
description: Quiet parking lot or place to stay to look at the great lake and rocks (see pictures). Easy parking next to the road and there are no services but there is a small playground next door and it is very quiet as the bunnies stop there. The parking bays are very large and there are some in the street or streets below, so suitable for very large cars. From there you walk about 30 minutes along the road through the lemon trees, then you come to the viewpoint Mirador de Librilla. Unfortunately, you can't go down to the lake (from there), but the view is great. Google Maps indicates the vantage point somewhat imprecisely, you have to walk a little further.

title: (30892) Librilla - 1 Calle Reina Sofía
description: Generous parking lot, little frequented at the end of the village. A few trees offer some privacy from the road. Very quiet apart from traffic noise and no movements in the parking lot. Ideal for an overnight stop in transit.

title: (30892) Librilla - 479 Urbanización el Pedregalejo
description: Nice parking spots far away for a highway and city. Perfect for a very quiet overnight after a long highway drive. The sounds of birds in the morning are beautiful.

title: (30848) Murcia - 9 Diseminado Sierra Espuña
description: Parking located next to a recreation area in the Sierra de Espuña Natural Park, with picnic area, and the starting point for many hiking trails, it is quite level.

name: A-Seven Totana Camperstop
title: (30850) A-Seven Totana Camperstop
description: A-Seven Totana Camperstop

title: (30850) Totana - 2 Calle Ojo Peralta
description: Huge parking lot (can accommodate more than 500 trucks). Great to spend the night if you are passing through or have to work on your camper as there is an adjacent industrial area. The ground is gravel. If you are all the way in the back you hear almost no traffic.

title: (30892) Librilla - 1 Diseminado los Ballesteros
description: Quiet place next to a restaurant, closed on weekdays, weekend I can't comment

title: (30892) Librilla - 11 Paraje los Palacios
description: The hot shower.

title: (30850) Diputación de Mortí - 389 Lugar Morti Alto
title_short: (30850) Diputación de Mortí - 389 Lugar Morti Alto
description: CAMPERSTOP SIERRA ESPUÑA. TOTANA. This stop over is featured in All the Aires (84). It has one shower which is clean, 5 minutes use, pay via a box on wall. The owner is very friendly and lives next door. Excellent stop for mountain biking and walking.

title: (30849) Alhama de Murcia - RM-E24
description: C'est un lieu en pleine nature bien tranquille pour une nuit

title: (30859) Totana -
description: Parking at Mirador del Corazón de Jesús. Beautiful view. 1 or 2 fairly flat places, others strongly inclined.

title: (30859) Totana - RM-502
description: Picnic area near the sanctuary has barbecues, toilets and drinking water source. No flat surface to sleep. Not very big and might be busy during weekends. Good to make manual service of waters but overnight stay better at sanctuary parking.

title: (30859) Totana - RM-502
description: The Sanctuary of Santa Eulalia in Totana, Sierra de Espuña, was one of our discoveries in our first AC experience. Precise place, quiet and secluded. There is a bar that closes at night and a huge parking lot and toilets. It is worth the visit to the sanctuary and sleep in silence among pines is priceless

title: (30859) Totana - C-7
description: Beautiful picnic area on the small road that leads to the statue of Jesus. Many possibilities of barbecue and places to sit. Parking only at designated locations, but there is no prohibition! There are two parking spaces, one about 50 meters after the roundabout and the other a little higher. Great place. One could use the toilets from the next location (parking), near the church, walk maybe 5 minutes.

title: (30859) Sierra Espuña -
description: Leisure area "Las Alquerías".

name: Camping Totana
title: (30850) Camping Totana
description: , 27 Lugar Lebor Alto

title: (30176) Sangrador de las Anguilas - Unnamed Road
title_short: (30176) Sangrador de las Anguilas - Unnamed Road
description: Parking where to leave the vehicles. From there you begin to climb to the archaeological site of Almoloya.

title: (30859) Aledo - 27 Avenida Sierra Espuña
description: Parking at the entrance of the town, one of the few places to park a motorhome given the characteristics of the town on a hill with very narrow streets

title: (30859) Aledo - 9 Plaza Diputación
description: More or less level ground, very close to the other site and more central there are several bars and a supermarket nearby.

title: (30834) Librilla - 317 Carretera Ncnal 340
description: Overnight parking. quiet but noisy along the highway to Murcia.

title: (30850) -
description:
Totana south service station. Wide esplanade. Truck parking. Peaceful place. The noise of the highway is heard, although we have rested well.
Shower in the gas station.

title: (30859) Nonihay - 18 Diseminado
description:
It is a place that belongs to the town of Aledo, it is worth visiting to see the Strait of Arboleja, a narrowing between two mountains through which a small river flows. The place to spend the night has grills and water. Access is good although it doesn't look like it.
Large vans or motorhomes should not go over the bridge, it is dangerous since it is made to support up to 3500kg and who knows how long it has been made (it is made of wood, not recommended), it is better to park in the parking lot that is before.

title: (30177) Casas Nuevas -
description: New area in new houses. It has space for about 20 RVs and is behind the small town. Nearby is the Casas Nuevas hostel, which has a cafeteria and restaurant service. The neighborhood is very clean and the surroundings are really beautiful, on the slopes of the Sierra Espuña. 48 hours max. Illuminate a little less at night, it's like being under floodlights

title: (30176) Pliego - 10 Calle Río Segura
description: Quiet parking within the village. Right next to a park with water fountains. Normally they usually park a truck but there is plenty of parking for quite a few motorhomes. Well located for hiking excursions through this town.

title: (30850) - 154 Diseminado Lebor Bajo
description: New motorhome area and service area. You can refuel, spend the night, it has toilets (very clean), showers, laundry, children's play area, pet wash, caravan wash and the shop/cafeteria is open 24 hours. If you do not spend the night you also have access to the services but some with a small cost. The girls are very nice.

title: (30176) -
description: Sierra de Espuña. 2km from Pliego. Large parking at the reservoir. Very quiet, almost no traffic. Easy access.

title: (30153) La Murta - 1 Camino Sierra
description: Parking lot on the outskirts of La Murta, therefore very quiet. The bakery and playground are within walking distance in the small village and from the parking lot. Ideal starting point for hikes / bike tours in the Sierra of Carrescoy.

title: (30875) Murcia -
description: A bit of waste ground, would be ok for a night or 2. There are bars, shops and restaurants. Room for about 200 campers. No facilities but you can use the bars and restaurants if you eat and drink there. I even asked if i coud top up with there water and no problem.

title: (30814) Zarzadilla de Totana -
description: A nice place for a picnic or a night out, right next to a road with little traffic. A rascal who thinks of something other than a signpost here

title: (30816) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect and very quiet place to stop to eat. There are picnic tables, a place to have barbecues and if you go up to the church and the viewpoint, you have beautiful views of the valley. We stop to eat because it is 5 minutes from the highway, it is very quiet, it does not have services.

title: (30193) Los Baños - 19 Calle Juan Martínez Soto
title_short: (30193) Los Baños - 19 Calle Juan Martínez Soto
description: Parking between trees, beside a few centers of natural hot springs. Quiet and spacious. Ideal for after leaving the baths

title: (30816) La Hoya - 94 N-340a
description: Washing machine. Parking for small van, but there are places in the streets.

title: (30816) La Hoya - 33 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
title_short: (30816) La Hoya - 33 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
description: Simple parking without service. trade nearby restaurant 50M. calm during the day despite the road. very quiet night

title: (30170) Mula - 3 Calle de Leon Saavedra
description: Municipal area for motorhomes. Very nice view of the castle located on the hill opposite.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - Calle Helecho
description: Secluded place at the edge of the forest near the hot springs. Those who do not drive away directly by car (offroad) or come at night can park here. Small threshold to overcome. Sources in the direction of travel left hand. Oriented on the golf course. about 15 minutes walk.

title: (30170) Mula - 2 Calle Senda de la Morera
title_short: (30170) Mula - 2 Calle Senda de la Morera
description: Self-service laundry, with several washers and dryers. Also laundry services for pets. Very neat and clean

title: (30170) Mula - 41 Avenida Juan Antonio Perea
description: Parking in the Plaza de Abastos de Mula. Central. No services. We use it one afternoon to visit the town.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - Calle Helecho
description:
Great place in the middle of nature with hot springs. Small pools in different temperatures, protected between bushes. Nice to walk along a varied riverbed.
Access a bit difficult. Parallel to the highway is a very bumpy path. Deep potholes. Can you usually drive around.

title: (30320) Fuente Álamo de Murcia -
description: Quiet and level parking

title: (30837) Alcantarilla - 11 Calle Maestra Josefina Lozano Pinar
title_short: (30837) Alcantarilla - 11 Calle Maestra Josefina Lozano Pinar
description: Alcantarilla Athletics Tracks and Soccer Field. You can access to use the TOILETS and SHOWERS without problem, whether you are a resident of the town or not. Possibility of parking at the door. (Slight incline) a few meters below, in front of the San José Hospital, approximately 30 flat parking spaces.

title: (30193) Mula - Unnamed Road
description: Point of view on the castle and the village; if you follow the path, you will find a watering place, relaxing, with tables and benches in the shade of the trees. The area is worth visiting, but I do not know if it's ok to spend the night here. I tried, without problem.

title: (30194) Mula - 8 Carretera Caravaca
description: Small picnic area on the edge of the Northwest Greenway, belonging to the Mula-Bullas pilgrimage section to Caravaca de la Cruz. Gravel space for two vans or motorhomes. On the other side of the booth (old railroad stop) there are tables, wooden benches, bins and shady trees, here one or two small California-type vans fit, although the branches of the trees are very low. Surrounded by orchards and near a Sanctuary. Quite a number of people strolling on weekends.

title: (30194) Mula -
description: Little parking and picknick area. if the weather is good it’s possible to drive all the way through to the sitting area but right now it’s to muddy. park in the front and then walk further. no other camper, but also no signs it’s forbidden to stay. (oct 21)

title: (30194) Mula - Embalse de la Cierva
description: Small gravel footprint about 150m from the bank of the reservoir! Super calm and nice view! The reservoir is wonderful to walk on, our dogs had great bathing fun in the crystal-clear water! The picnic area marked opposite is max. passable for small camping vehicles! The liner given here can also be used!

title: (30832) Murcia - 2 N-344
description: Flat parking near the exit of the highway, without the inconvenience

title: (30832) Murcia - 2 Diseminado Contraparada
description: We spent a quiet night between the railway (a single train at 9pm) and a lemon plantation. . Perfect for cutting the trip, without moving away from the highway

name: Natur-Stellplatz Villa Tudela
title: (30879) Natur-Stellplatz Villa Tudela
description: Nature parking space Villa Tudela. Separated area for campers who are looking for peace and nature on the area of a finca. Great view of almond, fig and olive trees and the surrounding mountains. Observe wild rabbits, red partridge and sometimes eagles. Camping behavior expressly desired. “You should be able to enjoy camping on our pitch and have enough space.” After the harvest, organically grown, cold-pressed olive oil can be purchased from the nearby farmer. Swiss owners look forward to your visit (language: German, French, English). Voluntary fee for the maintenance and care of the parking spaces. Please inquire in advance by phone or Whatsapp. If possible, send a photo of your caravan so that we can clarify whether a suitable place is free for you. Open October to March. Visits outside the opening times are possible, but only by prior arrangement.

title: (30120) Murcia - 6 Calle Doctor Francisco Espinosa Espinosa
title_short: (30120) Murcia - 6 Calle Doctor Francisco Espinosa Espinosa
description: Free parking next to houses. It is perfect to spend a quiet day.

title: (30194) Mula - viaducto embalse de La Cierva
title_short: (30194) Mula - viaducto embalse de La Cierva
description: Secluded parking at the foot of the reservoir. Very quiet compared to those that are at the foot of the road, usually frequented at night by young people from the town (alcohol, parties, noise ...). It has high rocks in which to have beautiful views of the entire reservoir.

title: (30814) Zarzadilla de Totana - 8 Travesía San Isidro 4
title_short: (30814) Zarzadilla de Totana - 8 Travesía San Isidro 4
description: Quiet place where you can spend the night in the district of Zarzadilla de Totana, equipped with barbecues, tables, water. Ideal place for hiking or mountain biking since there are many routes in the area, also in the town you can find a pharmacy, bakery, grocery store, highly recommended at the BAR, where you can enjoy good food or have some good beers.

title: (30831) Murcia - Margen Rio Segura
description: A gravel road leads directly to the small foot. You can have a good night's sleep in the countryside. 3 minutes from the A7, but you only hear water and birds.

title: (30565) Las Torres de Cotillas - 45 Avenida Reyes Católicos
title_short: (30565) Las Torres de Cotillas - 45 Avenida Reyes Católicos
description: New Service Area since February 2021 in the sports area of the population. It has water service and parking. Pools, football, games, tennis, paddle tennis, pavilion ...

title: (30194) Mula - Unnamed Road
description: Outdoor parking in the heart of the Mula climbing sites

title: (30830) La Ñora - 9 Avenida Poeta Vicente Medina
title_short: (30830) La Ñora - 9 Avenida Poeta Vicente Medina
description: Paved parking with children's playground, in the center of town, 2 minutes from the bus stop and 10 from the tram ideal for overnight stay and visit Murcia

title: (30814) Torrealvilla - 91 Diseminado Torrealvilla
description: Drinking water tap in the middle of the village, near the church and the children's playground.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 3 Autovía Totana - Mazarrón
description: A supermarket to buy everything you need (consumer franchise), very friendly and great service.

title: (30120) Murcia - La Pisada del Diablo
description: Quiet place, many routes for mountain biking, hiking and trail. He has no water. Nearby bar for tapas very recommendable with a terrace to enjoy the freshness of summer.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 3 Autovía Totana - Mazarrón
description: Repsol garage. Parking spaces with electric hook up, water supply and waste point within the Repsol garage just off the main road. Huge entrance and turning, no height restrictions. Gravel standing, looks quite new (as at 2018).

title: (30150) - 29 Diseminado Carretera Valle
description: Great spot for the night with many walks and fantastic views over Murcia, 4/5 spaces for larger vans or motorhomes and loads for small vans.

title: (30320) Fuente Alamo - 3 Calle Sevilla Moreno
description: Very simple parking, a little off the main traffic. Quiet even if not very glamorous. Nearby there are also plenty of places to park for free if you don't like this parking lot. We stayed here for one night with our van on a Sunday evening.

title: (30194) Mula - Unnamed Road
description: Nice area to park under the pines and swim in the pools of the river. There is a spot 50 meters away and another, slightly larger, about 20 minutes away. Make the GPS better on Yechar and follow the signs for Fuente Caputa.

title: (30150) Murcia - 58 Carretera del Valle
description: Very good place to spend the night, with a BBQ area and bins. Good access on asphalt road and parking on land. Preferable to enter from the right. Hikers for the day. An excellent restaurant bar a few minutes walk away.

title: (30150) Murcia - Carretera El Valle
description: Picnic area known as the Valley. Quiet area, nearby bar with somewhat expensive prices but good quality. Close to the botanical garden. Many MTB routes, hiking and trail running. MOTORHOMES OVER 5.50 METERS AVOID THE URBAN CENTER OF LA ALBERCA, it is advisable to enter and exit through Algezares through the Fuensanta Sanctuary.

title: (30107) Murcia - 36 Avenida Juan Carlos ।
description: Quiet residential area next to the highway, close to supermarkets and bars (walking)

title: (30150) Murcia - 1 Calle San Antonio Pobre
description: Parking along a small road where only walkers and a few cars pass very nice view in the middle of nature we spent the quiet night there

title: (30151) Murcia - 83 Calle de la Luz
description:
I moved to this place as the other ones are either closed at 21h or occupied by chillin' youths.
This is close to a monastery where people seem to live. It's a bit lit during night and lies lower than the passing road. The nights are quiet. 3 cars passing before 11pm. It's great for hikes and views on Murcia.

title: (30815) Lorca - 363 Diseminado Aguaderas
description: Wide esplanade of land next to the hermitage, among olive trees. 13 km from Lorca, and on the road that goes to Campo López. There is little shade. Fairly level ground. We had a very quiet night.

title: (30009) Murcia - 1B Carril Clérigos
description: Parking to a park ... in the shade under the trees ... without services ... 4km from the cathedral

title: (30009) Murcia - Carril Pollos 49
description:
Area Camper Murcia Center

whatsapp available

We are located at the Espinardo-La Albatalia exit

Our Area has a 24H Security guard, 24H access

5000 meters available to our clients to park their motorhomes and enjoy the center of the city of Murcia.

30 places available

bike 5 minutes
By feet 10 minutes
car 2 minutes

We Speak English, Wir sprechen Deutsch,Parliamo Italiano, мы говорим по-русски.

title: (30800) Lorca - Avenida Europa 58
description: Laundry with 4 washing machines, of different sizes, and 2 dryers

title: (30157) Murcia - Calle Nuestra Señora de la Fuensanta
title_short: (30157) Murcia - Calle Nuestra Señora de la Fuensanta
description: Large car park by a church with no signs indicating restrictions. Fabulous little bar nearby for excellent and cheap food.

address.street: Calle Nuestra Señora de la Fuensanta

title: (30870) Mazarrón -
description: Beautiful abandoned mineral mine, landscape like on Mars. Uphill gravel road. We drove in without a 4x4. It may be too narrow for large motorhomes. There are two large flat squares between the buildings on site. During the day a lot of walkers, at night we were alone.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 2 Calle Santa Lucia
description: In front of the Mazarrón mines, no prohibition signs, we spent a quiet night there. A little noise at the level of the road below but not very disturbing. Ideal for visiting the mines. Several spaces in the parking lot below. We went there with a 7 meter motorhome. Possibility to turn around. No services

title: (30870) - Autopista AP-7, Km 848
description: Gas station with easily accessible free water tap.

title: (30611) Murcia - 5 Diseminado el Mayes
description: Quiet place, good views, bike and walking routes

title: (30500) Molina de Segura - Av. Rio Segura
title_short: (30500) Molina de Segura - Av. Rio Segura
description:
Nice and quiet parking space bordering the town of Molina de Segura with the orchard. Asphalted, fenced, lighted, flat. Connection with the greenway just in front that will take you to the Segura River or the greenway on the way north-west (towards Caravaca).

Motorhome area inaugurated in March 2023 with picnic tables and chairs and 100m from the center of Molina de Segura.

Mudem museum and old town 200 m away, shopping center and small shops and numerous restaurants across the street.

Quiet place with many possibilities.

title: (30870) Mazarrón -
description: Secluded location in ruins near an old mine

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 132 Diseminado Rincones
description: Cheap diesel, at transport company. only between 7 am and 10 pm

title: (30010) Murcia - 9 Carril Ortuños
description: Big parking lot where guys for a small tip will allocate you a spot. great for a visit to the city. lots of space, 7m walk from the old center.

title: (30332) Balsapintada - 50 Pasaje Jacintos
description: Near a petrol station, to sleep very quiet, no problems with the Station, I asked the owner

title: (30815) Campo López -
description: Slightly offset from the road, an area for 2 or 3 vans. View of the mountains (not spectacular anyway). Absolute calm, a few cyclists on the road.

title: (30004) Murcia - 8 Camino Bajo Autopista
description: Parking under the highway to visit the old town of Murcia. 10 minute walk. We have only been during the day, a lot of noise at night. We in van but possibility of campers and motorhomes. The squares are not delimited

title: (30180) Bullas - Diseminado Sendero Fuente Mula
description: Parking next to a swimming area. Fairly quiet, the road is a bit busy but nothing more. Not far from the salto del usero on foot.

title: (30012) Murcia - 26 Diseminado Taller
description: There are several parking spaces around a football stadium, next to residence, place in the middle with children's playground 5-10 minutes by car from the city center

title: (30005) Murcia - 1 Calle Los Torres
description: Payment area according to applicable hours. We park for free after 8pm and check out before 9am the next day. Wide spaces only in this sector.

title: (30562) Ceutí - Calle Río Quípar
description: Ceutí Municipal Space.- The area is in urban areas near the industrial area. Downtown '300 m. Supermarket 100 m. This area has adapted toilets (ask for the key at City Hall) Hotel facilities are in town.

title: (30004) Murcia - 8 Calle Alcalde Gaspar de La Peña
title_short: (30004) Murcia - 8 Calle Alcalde Gaspar de La Peña
description: Public parking Very good to walk downtown, the aquarium or the park. There are gorillas but friendly and help to find a good place because the parking is full and can cost to leave. We have been only during the day. At night I do not trust, and it is also very loud.

address.street: 8 Calle Alcalde Gaspar de La Peña

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 3 Calle Salvador Dalí
description: Launderette with parking.

name: Camping le Rafa
title: (30180) Camping le Rafa
description: Plots of tranquility and level. Pool.

name: BP
title: (30800) BP
description: Laundromat with washing machines directly at the BP petrol station

title: (30564) Lorquí - Calle Clara Campoamor
description: Community area Lorqui. Downtown shops are about 500 m in the park itself there are public toilets. Note: Monday morning 7: 00 to 15: 00 market weekly to place in this area, is the extent and the surface water exchange cancelled.

title: (30100) Murcia - 7 Calle Campus Universitario
description: Online parking on campus, I park here for an exam, very quiet all night and passers-by from campus pass by from time to time.

title: (30009) Murcia - 18 Calle Cisne
description: Parking for cars and other vehicles

title: (30180) Bullas - 25 Calle del Río
description: Salto de Usero public parking with many possibilities.

title: (30329) - 18 Pasaje Zarzas
description: A couple of level spots around this Ermita, between the fields and with a nice view. No shade, no services

title: (30800) Lorca - C. Cta. de Ferrer
description:
Paid motorhome area with water, gray water and black water services and electrical connections.

Restricted access, access only after paying at the cash desk at the barrier

"RULES OF USE OF THE SERVICE AREA

1. Area for the exclusive use of motorhomes, caravans, campers and the like.

2. Parking within the boundaries is allowed, but no camping behavior. For these purposes, items such as tables, chairs, grills, awnings and other similar items of motorhomes are considered camping.

3. Maximum parking time is 48 hours.

4. It is forbidden to make fire in the enclosure or to wash the vehicles.

5. Do not spill liquids outside authorized landfills.

6. Respect other users and neighbors. (especially the neighbors in the buildings next door! They have signs on their balconies against this trailer park. So please stay calm)

7. Help us keep the area clean.

8. Users must comply with all other types of notices that the Town of Lorca requires for the maintenance of the service area.

9. Non-compliance with these rules will be sanctioned.

title: (30800) Lorca - 45 Calle Carril de Caldereros
description: Small parking to visit the City of Lorca.

title: (30100) Murcia - 26 Diseminado Carretera Madrid
description: Small service station (fuel price cheaper than in main known companies), with access to drinking water for filling tanks). They have a built-in high flow hose. Free wheel pressure maintenance area. Access has power outlets (you have to ask for permission). At night it is closed.

title: (30800) Lorca - 17 Calle Puerta de San Ginés
title_short: (30800) Lorca - 17 Calle Puerta de San Ginés
description:
Paid parking without service, but central. This is the blue zone. Allows you to pay a maximum of 2h (you must renew it).
Next to the EL TALLER DEL TIEMPO visitor center, which is worth a visit.

title: (30335) Las Palas -
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Next to a fenced reservoir. There are farms nearby but no smell. The road is dirt, so if it has rained recently I do not recommend driving on it. Watch out for the GPS that takes you on another path and then tells you to walk for a section. Better look at the map and draw the route yourself to get there.

title: (30870) Mazarrón - 6 Avenida de las Moreras
description: Raspa Oil LPG and Fuel.

title: (30876) Mazarrón -
description: Thought I'd arrive somewhere else! Since Google sent me wrong on an unpaved path, I ended up in a nice place! (I came with a crafter bus, it was certainly doable but just take it easy) Fire without problems;) live life everyone

title: (30180) Bullas - 10 Calle Camino Del Prado
description: Parking for the night and visit the city sol en gravilloñs

title: (30180) Bullas - 6 Calle Blas Infante
description: Parking in a dirt area with a high-pressure water source and a nearby supermarket. You can spend the night and it is close to the town and a few meters from the wine museum in Bullas. The place is quiet to spend both the day and the night.

title: (30011) Murcia - 11E Calle Limonar
description: Huge parking with no limits an no fees, There is a small park where I could walk the dogs and children can play. Close to stores and hospital.

title: (30157) Murcia - 3 Diseminado Subida Cresta Gallo
description:
Beautiful quiet spot with amazing view on Murcia by ba and night, for just 1/2 cars to park
Ground is not flat, therefore to visit by foot or offroad vehicle, but i did with a peugeot partner, except of that, excellent spot, best of all others on this mountain.

title: (30815) Lorca/Aguaderas - Carretera Malvaloca 174
description: Private parking space on a fenced plot

title: (30500) Molina de Segura - Ctra de Madrid
title_short: (30500) Molina de Segura - Ctra de Madrid
description: Service area with supermarket, cafeteria, washers, dryers, washing machine for pets, good access from the highway, motorhome wash. parking.

title: (30189) - 10 Diseminado la Atalaya
description: Parking of the Watchtower, in slope. There are good views of Monte del Castellar and Aceniche valley to one side and the town from the other. Ideal for van, perhaps for motorhome is not recommended. Very quiet place There are no services.

title: (30007) Murcia - 44 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
description: Good place to spend the night. Good cafeteria and good meat pie typical of Murcia. No problem overnight.

title: (30008) Murcia - 5 Calle Nuestra Señora de los Buenos Libros
title_short: (30008) Murcia - 5 Calle Nuestra Señora de los Buenos Libros
description: Nice clean laundromat in Murcia. Parking in front of the door with a parking ticket, but parking spaces are only suitable for cars. We parked outside and came by bike. There is a nice park nearby where you can wait for the laundry.

address.street: 5 Calle Nuestra Señora de los Buenos Libros

title: (30800) Lorca - 6 Calle Menchiron
description: Parking, you can spend the night

title: (30564) Lorquí - Esquina Avenida Papa Ali
description: There are washing machines and a great washing area for motorhomes of all sizes. There is a walk-in jetty at the washing area to wash the roof. The facility is great and for little money. You can pay with euro coins. You can get coins for the laundromat at the petrol station.

title: (30007) Murcia - 88 Plaza de Gran Capitan
description: Open parking Perfect for night or visiting the city. recommended vehicles no larger than 6 meters. No services unguarded, free

name: alojamientos rurales Cloan
title: (30180) alojamientos rurales Cloan
description:
Rural motorhome, complex of rural houses, with a small area for cars/caravans in a privileged environment, in the middle of nature, ideal for disconnecting, resting, hiking routes, visiting incredible places and enjoying a swim in our wonderful swimming pool, soccer field room, hunting park, park with swings, available with a refrigerator, sink and hot water shower included in the price. Payment washing machine. Concrete parking, 3 kilometers from Bullas, 10 minutes to Caravaca de la Cruz. You can also enjoy a great swim in the Salto del Usero. TO STAY OR RESERVATION, CALL THE PHONE.
Prices:
-July/August/September, Long Weekends and Holidays
-The rest of the year
-1 person alone all year round: single rate

title: (30800) Lorca - 15 Alameda de Cervantes
description: Laundromat

title: (30007) Murcia - 17 Plaza de Tetuan
description: Plaza Detetuan. Parking only. A4 minutes walk from the Center. Quiet to leave the car, visit the city and spend the night. There are several squares like this around Europe Avda.

name: Finca La Manchica
title: (30398) Finca La Manchica
description: Small motorhome parking for max 3 motorhomes, located in nature. 20 min drive from the beautiful port city of Cartagena . If you are looking for peace and quiet, you have come to the right place.

title: (30110) Murcia -
description: Free on-road parking by a small park. Took us about 25 minutes to walk into town almost in a straight line along the de Churra road. The patisserie and bakery nearby is superb and worth stopping at alone. It’s a pretty quiet area but we only parked up for about 2 or 3 hours in the afternoon. There’s a little dog park just across the road.

name: "El Moreral" Área de Autocaravanas.
title: (30877) "El Moreral" Área de Autocaravanas.
description: Newly opened area with many services and ample parking, located in an emblematic place with a beach 5 minutes away, and in the middle of the mountain. Quiet, natural area with a Gas Station, Supermarket, Town and Port very close to our town.

title: (30800) Lorca - 52 Diseminado Tiata
description: Large gravel parking, close to the center of Lorca. Upon entering the city, the Municipal Police recommended it to us to visit the city. We did not spend the night but there are no prohibition signs although it is somewhat noisy. No services.

title: (30007) Murcia - 3A Avenida de Santiago
description: Parking, prohibited more than 5m, very close to the center is not monitored but has security cameras

title: (30877) Mazarrón - 18 Diseminado Moreras
description: Public scales to weigh the camper. Just drive on it and throw it into the machine. A note will come out with the result.

title: (30800) Lorca - Calle Actor Antonio Tudela
description: Very wide and relatively close to the center, seems very quiet

title: (30800) Lorca - C. Pilones
description: Castille de Lorca car park, follow these directions to access it. Several spaces suitable for 6 m vans, including a larger one at the back.

title: (30007) Murcia - 1 Calle Presbítero Francisco Ibáñez Ruiz
title_short: (30007) Murcia - 1 Calle Presbítero Francisco Ibáñez Ruiz
description: Counter-alley with the possibility of parking in several places. Close to the cathedral and cycle path along this avenue.

name: Área Camper Mazarrón

description: Motorhome Services Area in Mazarrón, Murcia (Costa Cálida). With all the comforts and services, including indoor wintering and transfer to the airport.

title: (30011) Murcia - 4a Senda Estrecha
description: 2,6 km from the city center

title: (30011) Murcia - 5I Calle Ua III Pp CR4
title_short: (30011) Murcia - 5I Calle Ua III Pp CR4
description: There are several parking lots and there is no problem. It's a very quiet area with gas station and shopping center 3 minutes walk away. I parked here to attend the Warm Up Festival and it's a perfect location.

title: (30158) Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: Easy to get to, no water, no service except picnic with tables, very spacious parking, comfortable and a spectacular view, is a busy site at all times.

title: (30800) Lorca - 4D Calle Rambla Alta
description: Free dirt parking and ten minutes from downtown. Spacious and quiet place.

title: (30509) Molina de Segura - 380 Autovía de Murcia
title_short: (30509) Molina de Segura - 380 Autovía de Murcia
description: Gas station 24, clean bathrooms and shower. Allows overnight

name: Área autocaravanas Murcia
title: (30100) Área autocaravanas Murcia
description: Parking Ikea Thader shopping center. Avenue Juan de Bourbon 30100 Murcia. Lidl, Aldy next door. Parking near the trams to go to the city center (Plaza Circular station). Stand at the place indicated on the GPS, it is where the security guard cabin is and the ground is grassy with cobblestones. Drainage and water service next door. Desde Agosto 17 con servicios, passing through on 01/10/2017. Guardian present 24 hours a day, every day. Frequent Local Policia rounds. For max.72 hours!

title: (30006) Murcia - 8 Camino Orilla del Río
description: La Fica fairground esplanade

title: (30007) Murcia - 8 Calle de Molina de Segura
title_short: (30007) Murcia - 8 Calle de Molina de Segura
description: A parking place recommend to me by a local as a safe place near the city to park. It was empty in the afternoon, but filled up later. I parked my van here overnight with no problems (but I didnt sleep in it)

title: (30110) Murcia - 2E Calle S1 Zt Churra 2
description: Laundry, self-service, at the BP petrol station. Parking possible with a bit of luck. 4x8 kg 2x 14 kg 6 dryer wheelchair accessible. Even washing at 90° is possible.

title: (30110) Churra - 511 Calle S1 Zt Churra 2
description: There is free water at the Campsa red station,  inflating tires! right next to another station where there is the laundry and also the same services

title: (30110) Churra - S/N Avenida Juan de Borbón
title_short: (30110) Churra - S/N Avenida Juan de Borbón
description: Possibility of refilling gas cylinders with your connection

title: (30007) Murcia - 25 Calle Carril Calesas
description: Coin operated washers and dryers, open 24 hours. Self-service laundry.

title: (30007) Murcia - 16 Calle Cieza
description: The place is quite safe even though we have never slept here. The city of Murcia seems very safe so I think you can feel very comfortable here. Near the gym there is a bus stop that takes you directly to the city centre. The bus to take is R20 which takes you directly to the centre. You can buy the ticket directly on board.

title: (30800) Lorca - 20 Calle Modistería
description: Land near a subdivision, no services, no parking restrictions, the neighborhood seems quiet, a little far from the city center, the location seems correct to us, but little space in large ruts prevents access to the whole of the place.

title: (30564) Lorquí - 14 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Open and flat space of dirt and gravel for several vehicles next to the Virgen del Rosario hermitage. On top of a hill, on the outskirts of the industrial estate, very quiet and without shade. Nobody passes by here. You can hear the road in the background as white noise, but also the birds around you. To spend a calm night with views of the surroundings. Access by hill, but without major problem.

title: (30506) Molina de Segura - 16 Avenida de los Castaños
title_short: (30506) Molina de Segura - 16 Avenida de los Castaños
description: Public parking for the night. There is a gas station and areas to buy food nearby. Quiet place and close to the highway.

name: Restaurante Campomar
title: (30398) Restaurante Campomar
description: Ideal to spend the night, the owner had been very helpful in closing the restaurant and when we arrived. Very quiet area and many areas to stand in the heart of nature

title: (30800) Lorca - 87 Carretera de Granada
description: Supermarket with dining area, with microwave, biodegradable cutlery, tables. it is possible to buy food inside and heat it up and consume it in the dining area. spacious and clean bathrooms. free parking

title: (30600) Archena - 61 Avenida del Río Segura
description: A large parking area next to a sports hall and next to the river. The city is famous for its spa that offers excellent beauty and relaxation treatments with excellent heated swimming pools. There is a beautiful bike path along the river into town. There is some noise and flood lights from the sports stadium, but not too much to be annoying.

title: (30189) Bullas - Carretera Chaparral
description: Parking and rest area of the greenway of the Northwest at the height of the municipality of Bullas. There is shade, table with benches and garbage containers. This stretch of the greenway is beautiful in spring when the cercis bloom. Ideal for walking and cycling routes. I don't know if it's allowed to sleep.

name: Área Camper Murcia Río
title: (30006) Área Camper Murcia Río
description: Come and enjoy an unforgettable vacation in the Huerta de Murcia and its Camper Area! This area is located just 5 minutes by car from the historic center of Murcia, with shops, pharmacies, restaurants, shops, cafes, supermarkets, gas stations, among others. Our area has two plots for campers: one with 14 spaces with electricity and water and a larger one with 30 spaces. We also offer toilets and free shower services. Also, to get to the city without traffic, there is a very pleasant walk along the river. Don't wait any longer and come and enjoy your vacation!

title: (30876) Cañada de Gallego - 267 Diseminado Ifre
description: BP petrol station where you can empty gray and black water for free and fill 15 liters of clean water with 0.50 euro coins. Gas bottle exchange.

title: (30612) Ulea - C. Calvo Sotelo
description: Quiet parking options along the segura river and the tramo verde between Villanueva and Ulea. From Villanueva over the bridge to Ulea sharp left or right. Very little traffic. Good starting point to explore the ricote valley towards Ojos and Blanca on foot or by bike or on the other side the ruta des miradores.

title: (30813) Lorca - km.08 Autovía Lorca-Águilas
description: Fuel station with Autogas/LPG, next to a main road. Good accessibility.

title: (30600) Archena - Calle Cophenague
description: Parking for motorhomes in the Archena spa. Free for spa users. Overnight stay is not allowed.

title: (30506) Molina de Segura - 100 Avenida del Golf
title_short: (30506) Molina de Segura - 100 Avenida del Golf
description: Parking of a small super quiet shopping center, free and open 24 hours with a supermarket and gas station. It is perfect because it is located in a luxury urbanization with private security.

title: (30812) Avilés - 1 Calle Avilés 09
description: There are several camping tables, there is also a park for children and a water fountain, although the fountain states that the water is not drinkable, the truth is that it is, I was born and raised in that town and we always drink that water, the artist is because the water is not treated the area also has large areas is flat

title: (30877) Mazarrón - 131 Urbanizacion Punta Vela
description: Several quiet spots around this loop rather suitable for 4x4, but maybe it is tried with a larger vehicle

title: (30564) Lorquí - Avenida Iryda
description: Small parking lot on the corner of a tree area. We stopped at rest and lunch. There is a bell pepper in the corner with a small shop.

title: (30877) Mazarrón - 184D Urbanizacion Punta Vela
description: At the start of the hiking and cycling trails through the mountains. Easy access and next to the beach. A beautiful spot close to nature. Very quiet.

title: (30813) Lorca - 62 Autovía Lorca-Águilas
description: Water tap in the gas station parking lot. Water not drinkable but it's free. There is also fuel and garbage cans.

title: (30398) Collado de Tallante - 6 Pasaje el Collao
title_short: (30398) Collado de Tallante - 6 Pasaje el Collao
description: Site of an individual to spend short stays.

title: (30877) Mazarrón - 101 Urbanizacion Punta Vela
description:
Parking space in residential area. 
max 4 small/medium camper pitches

title: (30813) Lorca - 763 Diseminado Campillo
description: Parque Almenara shopping center parking, no service but Carrefour supermarket and its impeccable wifi, plus the wifi from the shopping center to the parking lot

title: (30877) Mazarrón - Calle Pedro López Meca
description: Nice stay for the day, off season. In the season it is very dusty and the noise from pubs, restaurants and people drinking. Parking for a maximum of 4 hours. In no case leave rubbish there or camping behavior, otherwise the place could be closed!

title: (30610) Ricote - RM-B15
description: Mirador del Alberque. lovely views over Ricote and on a nice 10k circular walk. The track to the Mirador is sound but a bit lumpy. Once at the top the parking is flat.

title: (30611) Ricote - RM-521
description: Quiet parking for the night, without services.

title: (30877) Bolnuevo - 8 Avenida de Bolnuevo
description:
Self-service laundry (LaColada Bolnuevo) next to the camping with on-street parking. Open every day from 8am to 8pm. 
Detergent and fabric softener are included and automatically.

title: (30612) Ulea - B-10
description: Recreation area with parking for all types of vehicles. picnic tables and bike parking. It is an ideal and quiet place to visit the beautiful Calle de Ricote, very close to other areas with picnic areas, routes and a river beach.

title: (30876) Cañada de Gallego -
description: Small sandy esplanade for 4/6 motorhomes, on the beach, without services. Nudist coves area, very quiet. The accesses are dirt and stone roads more or less traveled. Recommended 4x4 in sandy areas.

name: Camping Playa de Mazarrón
title: (30877) Camping Playa de Mazarrón
description: Lovely campsite for tents, caravans and motorhomes. stayed 2 nights July. well worth going to

title: (30397) Cartagena -
description: Good place for small vehicles. Steep, narrow and dusty access road. There are grill places, some flat spaces there. And at the top, next to the chapel, there is also a flat area. Up there, there is noise from the Sabic factory but the view is pretty. Lower is calm. Note: Be careful on the platform next to the chapel, avoid the small metal bars coming out of the concrete. No shade, no services. It takes the agreement of the owner to stay there.

title: (30876) Mazarrón - Avenida Pedro López Meca
description: Small plain at the foot of the beach, along a path that borders the entire coastline where you will find a multitude of mobile homes on the way

title: () Mazarrón - Camino del Cementerio
description: BP service station with water filling tap. For 5 minutes. (About 40 liters). If you buy fuel, you can claim 1 free token. No faucet adapter needed.

name: Camping Las Torres Mazarron
title: (30868) Camping Las Torres Mazarron
description: Mazarrón, Unnamed Road. Las Torres campsite at the top of a hill 5 km from Mazaron delimited pitches approved by ACSI

title: (30610) Ricote - 2 Calle F
description: Large fenced gravel lot next to a sports hall. Level and calm. Lemon trees all around. Water disposal and drinking water against brands that are available in every store. The box looks a bit dented though. Bakery, shops and very good restaurants! Place with a lot of history. The area around is terrific and the 360 degree view makes up for the simple place!

title: (30870) Mazarrón - Camino del Cementerio
description: Streets with quiet parking next to shopping centers and playground

title: (30868) Mazarrón - 26 Calle M
description: Parking behind the college well known to motorhome because there are always people. Lidl and other supermarket next door. Quiet to spend the night. Only 48h.

title: (30430) Cehegín - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with 3 tables and shade. There is room for several vans. Fire prohibited. Hiking and mountain biking trails.

title: (30876) Lorca - 16 N-332-2
description: Repsol service station.
